title: Basic Usage
content: For details, see the following example.
findIntroStr: Currency component, which is used to display and select currency names. The options are obtained by configuring the data source.

title: Disabled
content: The disabled attribute is used to set whether to disable the component. The default value is false.
findIntroStr: Currency component, which is used to display and select currency names. The options are obtained by configuring the data source.

title: Custom Service
content: You can use the fetch-currency attribute to specify a method in which the service customized by the request can be implemented. The clearable attribute is used to set whether data can be cleared. The default value is true.
findIntroStr: Currency component, which is used to display and select currency names. The options are obtained by configuring the data source.

title: Set Component Size
